io.github.nucleuspowered.nucleus.api.service

Interface NucleusMailService


  • public interface NucleusMailService
    A service that handles sending and retrieving mail.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  NucleusMailService.MailFilter
      This NucleusMailService.MailFilter is simply to prevent compiler warnings with varargs, and is functionally the same as a Predicate

    • Method Detail

      • getMail

        java.util.List<MailMessage> getMail(org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.User player,
                                    NucleusMailService.MailFilter... filters)
        Gets mail for a specific player, optionally including a list of filters.
        Parameters:
        player - The User of the player to get the mail of.
        filters - The NucleusMailService.MailFilters
        Returns:
        A list of mail.

      • removeMail

        boolean removeMail(org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.User player,
                   MailMessage mailData)
        Removes a specific mail for a specific player.
        Parameters:
        player - The User to remove the mail from.
        mailData - The MailMessage to remove from the player.
        Returns:
        true if the mail was removed, false if the player didn't have the mail.

      • sendMail

        void sendMail(org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.User playerFrom,
              org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.User playerTo,
              java.lang.String message)
        Sends mail to a subject, addressed from another subject.
        Parameters:
        playerFrom - The User of the player to send the message from.
        playerTo - The User of the player to send the message to.
        message - The message.

      • sendMailFromConsole

        void sendMailFromConsole(org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.User playerTo,
                         java.lang.String message)
        Sends mail to a player, addressed from the console.
        Parameters:
        playerTo - The User of the player to send the message to.
        message - The message.

      • clearUserMail

        boolean clearUserMail(org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.User player)
        Clears the player's mail.
        Parameters:
        player - The UUID of the player.
        Returns:
        If there was any mail cleared

      • createSenderFilter

        default NucleusMailService.MailFilter createSenderFilter(boolean includeConsole,
                                                         java.util.UUID... player)
        Create a filter that restricts the mail to the senders provided.

        Multiple player filters can be provided - this will return messages authored by all specified players.

        Parameters:
        includeConsole - If true, include the console/plugins in any returned mail.
        player - The UUIDs of the players.
        Returns:
        The NucleusMailService.MailFilter

      • createSenderFilter

        default NucleusMailService.MailFilter createSenderFilter(boolean includeConsole,
                                                         java.util.Collection<java.util.UUID> player)
        Create a filter that restricts the mail to the senders provided.

        Multiple player filters can be provided - this will return messages authored by all specified players.

        Parameters:
        includeConsole - If true, include the console/plugins in any returned mail.
        player - The UUIDs of the players.
        Returns:
        The NucleusMailService.MailFilter

      • createDateFilter

        default NucleusMailService.MailFilter createDateFilter(@Nullable
                                                       java.time.Instant after,
                                                       @Nullable
                                                       java.time.Instant before)
        Create a filter that restricts the mail to a certain time period. One parameter may be null, but not both. The times on the instants will be ignored.

        Only one of these filters can be used at a time.

        Parameters:
        after - The Instant which indicates the earliest date to return.
        before - The Instant which indicates the latest date to return.
        Returns:
        The NucleusMailService.MailFilter

      • createMessageFilter

        default NucleusMailService.MailFilter createMessageFilter(boolean caseSensitive,
                                                          java.lang.String... message)
        Create a filter that restricts the messages returned to the provided substring.

        If multiple strings are set, all need to match.

        Parameters:
        caseSensitive - Whether this filter is case sensitive.
        message - The message.
        Returns:
        The NucleusMailService.MailFilter

      • createMessageFilter

        default NucleusMailService.MailFilter createMessageFilter(boolean caseSensitive,
                                                          java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> message)
        Create a filter that restricts the messages returned to the provided substring.

        If multiple strings are set, all need to match.

        Parameters:
        caseSensitive - Whether this filter is case sensitive.
        message - The message.
        Returns:
        The NucleusMailService.MailFilter
